title: Void Manipulator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Make a black hole at a house.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Making a black hole at someone's house creates a Powerful rampage.
- Your visit is astral.
- Making a black hole on yourself gives you Powerful defense, and you deal a Powerful attack to anyone who visits you.
- Anyone who you kill will have their role and last will lost to the void and it will not be shown.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the void.

desc:
Post 435
*"Black holes, what a wonderous subject. I'd gladly teach the town about them, but they still don't forgive me when I threw the Mayor into a black hole to demonstrate the destructive effects."*
